name: Alien Eats
description:
The flight control system of the Gourmet Galaxy broke down! The aliens need your help NOW. Help them deliver their ingredients and dishes!

Don't let the spaceships crash into each other! Make use of the black holes to change time and routes! Don't take too much time for your deliveries, before your clients will complain about complain about the food that has gone cold (and write a bad yelp review!!!).

For the game you use your mouse as input device.

Contributors:
- Paul Amelingmeyer, 9. Semester CVD
- Jan-Gustav Liedtke 7. Semester CVD
- Lucas Oelke, 5. Semester CVD

- Michelle Hallmann, 9. Semester CVD
